result.execSummary:
The defendant Kelly James Kloss was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kelly James Kloss is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges. On one or more other charges, Kelly James Kloss was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kelly James Kloss is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Kelly James Kloss was found guilty of Possession of Firearm by Felon [Modifiers: Repeater, Penalties for Felonies-Class "G" Felony], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2).
  • Kelly James Kloss was found guilty of Solicitation [Modifiers: Solicitation of Felony], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.23(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

-   Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol.

-   Not to possess any firearms including wife

-   Report to the Day Report Center at 1752 Dorsett Lane, New Richmond, WI within 24 hours (of release).  Day Report Center testing hours are 6:00 am-4:30 pm/7 days per week. Upon arrival, call 715-245-4109. I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Day Report Center Agreement on today's date. I further understand that I am required to submit to ETG testing for alcohol, on Tuesday's & Friday's per week. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in an arrest warrant and/or referral for criminal charges.

-  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  River Falls Police Department unless part of their daily duties.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

CO: Harrington, REP: Colbert, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Rory Eoin O'Sullivan   DF ATTY:  Aaron A. Nelson   DF:  Kelly James Kloss appeared from jail. COURT TRIAL DAY 3. Case called at 9:44 a.m. State calls Cheryl Kloss to the stand. S/T Cheryl Kloss. Direct by the State. PL Exhibit #31 (notebook taken from C.K. in the jail). O/R Exhibit #31. Cross by Atty Nelson. Redirect by ADA O'Sullivan. Witness excused. State calls Investigator Knudson to the stand. S/T Jennifer Knutson. Direct by ADA O'Sullivan. Cross by Atty Nelson. Witness excused. State rests at 10:53 a.m. Atty Nelson moves for a directed verdict and gives argument. ADA O'Sullivan responds. Court denies motion. Atty Nelson requesting a recess. Court will recess at 11:08 a.m. Case recalled at 11:23 a.m. Atty Nelson states that he explained rights to his client and DE wishes to waive his right to testify and shall remain silent. S/T Kelly James Kloss. Court reviews rights with DE. *AMENDED*
-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Anthony P.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Anthony P.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
